data.message:
This is the young man who invented Facebook ! He has to put some restriction on pornografie and video of violente nature there are no protection against the people who steele identites from poeple that you have knowne 20 years ago and all of a sudden the picture shown are the pictures of the friend you had lost contact with but the accent and the voice are very different ! Then you are told that your faraway friend has been robbed of money clothes computers eetc and the demands for môney start and it never stops !' Apres investigation you will fiknd that it may be your frieb pictures but it is an African and not your friend ! And by then 5 women had helped the younger man to the tune ot tooo0$ and morenis needed !!this and pornografie has no place in the social media ! But Katzenberg who came up with Facebook has not put any stop
To these scams and a lot of elderly women have given all they had to someone in Africa that not even Interpole can do anything about !!
